allow: Bash(powershell "Get-Process node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object Id, ProcessName")
Bash(powershell "Stop-Process -Name node -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Host ''Node processes killed''")
Bash(powershell "if \(Test-Path ''.next''\) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force ''.next''; Write-Host ''.next folder deleted'' } else { Write-Host ''.next folder not found'' }")
Bash(powershell "Stop-Process -Id 23480 -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Stop-Process -Name node -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Host ''Processes killed''")
Bash(powershell "if \(Test-Path ''.next\\dev\\lock''\) { Remove-Item -Force ''.next\\dev\\lock''; Write-Host ''Lock file removed'' } else { Write-Host ''No lock file found'' }")
Bash(powershell "if \(Test-Path ''update-remaining-files.ps1''\) { .\\update-remaining-files.ps1 } else { Write-Host ''Script not found, will update files manually'' }")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Change status to ''info updated'' when applicant resubmits after Missing Information

Previously, when a referrer marked an applicant as "Missing Information" and
the applicant resubmitted, the status would reset to "new". Now it changes to
"info updated" to match the pattern of CV updates \(cv update requested â†’ cv updated\).

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix timezone validation to accept all IANA timezones

The server was rejecting valid timezones like Asia/Beirut because it
validated against a limited COMMON_TIMEZONES list. Now uses isValidTimezone\(\)
which validates any IANA timezone using Intl.DateTimeFormat.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Require email confirmation for existing applicant profile updates

Previously, existing applicants with matching email could update their
profile directly without confirmation. Now all updates require email
confirmation before changes are saved, matching the flow for new applicants.

- Store pending update payload and send confirmation email for all existing applicants
- Add cleanupExpiredPendingUpdates\(\) to clear stale pending data after 24 hours
- Remove unused imports from applicant route
